modw.job_tasks.name: Local Job Id
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The unique identifier assigned to the job by the job scheduler.

modw.job_tasks.name: Resource
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The resource that ran the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: System Username
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The username on the resource of the user that ran the job. May be a UID or string username depending on the resource.

modw.job_tasks.name: User
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The name of the job owner.

modw.job_tasks.name: Organization
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The organization of the person who ran the task

modw.job_tasks.name: Name
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The name of the job as reported by the job scheduler.

modw.job_tasks.name: Submit Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: Task submission time

modw.job_tasks.name: Start Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The time that the job started running.

modw.job_tasks.name: End Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The time that the job ended.

modw.job_tasks.name: Eligible Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The time that the job was eligible for scheduling by the resource manager.

modw.job_tasks.name: Nodes
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The number of nodes that were assigned to the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: Cores
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The number of cores that were assigned to the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: Memory Used
modw.job_tasks.documentation: Memory consumed as reported by the resource manager.

modw.job_tasks.name: Wall Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: Overall job duration.

modw.job_tasks.name: Wait Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: Time the job waited in the queue

modw.job_tasks.name: Core Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The amount of CPU core time (Core Count * Wall Time)

modw.job_tasks.name: UNIX group name
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The name of the group that ran the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: UNIX group GID
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The GID of the group that ran the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: UNIX UID
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The UID of the user that ran the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: Exit Code
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The code that the job exited with.

modw.job_tasks.name: Exit State
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The state of the job when it completed.

modw.job_tasks.name: Requested Cores
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The number of CPUs required by the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: Requested memory
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The amount of memory required by the job.

modw.job_tasks.name: Requested Wall Time
modw.job_tasks.documentation: The time limit of the job.
